attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scientists have proved that Global Warming is happening NOW. It's To late to Stop it, the best thing we can do I try to Divert it. The Government is not doing much to Prevent this At the minute, but by the Time It's like Africa in England, Maybe THEN will they try to do something about it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
